title: IIT BHU Notification 2026 - Apply for Project Assistant Posts
description: Indian Institute of Technology BHU (IIT BHU)  has released an official notification for the recruitment of various Project Assistant Posts. Those candidates who have qualified in the Diploma, ITI, B.E/B. Tech can grab this chance and apply for the IIT BHU Notification 2026 . Here, we included the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can apply before the last date. If you are loo...
